channel.title: PokeClicker
channel.description:
I'm developing yet another browser based clicking game, just for the sake of it.
Gameplay: At the start, you'll have to choose between three starter pokemon: bulbasaur, charmander and squirtle. Each time you kill an enemy by clicking it, your pokemon gains experience. Once your pokemon reaches level 5, it attacks the enemy without you having to click it. However, clicking it will obviously deal extra damage. Occasionally, a fainted enemy pokemon will drop some coins with which you can buy new pokemon. You can have up to 6 pokemon in your party. Some basic damage-type (fire, water, ..) calculation will be done.
The game is being developed using Angular2 and node.js.
A gif showing the work in progress: [img]https://i.gyazo.com/adba393a96ed18c39d5388bb346b1bd9.gif[/img]
Also, if you guys could come up with an original name, please let me know! I'm currently thinking about something along the lines of Click à Mon or PokeClicker?
